name: d_mastercard__s4c
description: This table contains information about MasterCard accounts including their status, associated customer details, and usage limits.

columns.name: card_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the card

columns.name: cif
columns.description: Customer Information File number, a unique identifier for the customer

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account associated with the card

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the card (e.g., active, inactive)

columns.name: contract_number
columns.description: Number associated with the contract for the card

columns.name: contract_open_date
columns.description: Date when the contract was opened

columns.name: open_date
columns.description: Date when the card was activated

columns.name: expiration_date
columns.description: Date when the card expires

columns.name: card_lock_date
columns.description: Date when the card was locked

columns.name: card_active_date
columns.description: Date when the card became active

columns.name: daily_usage_limit
columns.description: Maximum amount that can be used on the card daily

columns.name: card_number
columns.description: The number printed on the card

columns.name: mobile_phone
columns.description: Mobile phone number associated with the cardholder

columns.name: birth_date
columns.description: Birth date of the cardholder

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the cardholder

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the cardholder

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the cardholder resides

columns.name: branch
columns.description: Branch associated with the card account

columns.name: crd_segment_code
columns.description: Code representing the customer segment

columns.name: onboarding_id
columns.description: Identifier for the onboarding process

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created in the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: Date used for partitioning in the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: Source system from which the data was obtained

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was processed in the data lake house

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year part of the date

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month part of the date

columns.name: day
columns.description: Day part of the date
